original_text: Pharaoh was once angry with his servants, and he imprisoned me and the chief baker in the house of the captain of the guard.
korean_text: 바로께서 종들에게 노하사 나와 떡 굽는 관원장을 친위대장의 집에 가두셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh was once angry with his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 바로가 한때 그의 종들에게 화가 났었고

sentences.original_text: in the house of the captain of the guard
